title: The Small Sports Take the Field!
description: Come meet The Small Sports team in their first storybook adventure! Jake is a determined little boy with a big imagination who more than anything wants to find the perfect place to play. When he sets out to create the field of his dreams, Jake meets a special group of neighborhood friends. Together, they learn about teamwork, good sportsmanship and cooperation while helping to make Jake's dream a reality. Are you ready to play? Ages 3-8
author: Matthew Damman
